channel.title: youtube
channel.description: Platform for Technology news, Knowledge, Information sharing

item.title: Fetch youtube video information from youtube video id.
item.dc:creator: Suraj Koli
item.description:
function getYouData($youtubeVideoID) { return json_decode(file_get_contents('http://www.youtube.com/oembed?url='.urlencode('http://youtu.be/'.$youtubeVideoID).'&format=json')); } Information like author_url,author_name,title,thumbnail_url etc.. $youtubevideoInfo=getYouData('xxxxxxxxxxx'); $author_url=$youtubevideoInfo->author_url; $author_name=$youtubevideoInfo->author_name; $title=$youtubevideoInfo->author_title; $thumbnail_url=$youtubevideoInfo->thumbnail_url;

The post Fetch youtube video information from youtube video id. appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
function getYouData($youtubeVideoID)
{
return json_decode(file_get_contents('http://www.youtube.com/oembed?url='.urlencode('http://youtu.be/'.$youtubeVideoID).'&format=json'));
}

Information like author_url,author_name,title,thumbnail_url etc..

$youtubevideoInfo=getYouData('xxxxxxxxxxx');

$author_url=$youtubevideoInfo->author_url;
$author_name=$youtubevideoInfo->author_name;
$title=$youtubevideoInfo->author_title;
$thumbnail_url=$youtubevideoInfo->thumbnail_url;

The post Fetch youtube video information from youtube video id. appeared first on .
